verbose_text: In prokaryotes, the only example of DNA ADP ribosylation is a toxin-antitoxin (TA) system from Thermus aquaticus, which harbors a toxin DarT that ADP-ribosylates single stranded DNA (ssDNA), in contrast to mammalian PARPs, which target dsDNA.
evidence: ADP-ribosylates single-stranded DNA (ssDNA)              , in contrast to mammalian PARPs
